text: Samsung Galaxy Note 9 (stylized as Samsung Galaxy Note9) is a Android phablet developed and marketed by Samsung. It was announced on 9 August 2018. == Features == The Galaxy Note 9 has 6.4 Super AMOLED HDR10 screen, 12MP auto-HDR wide and telephoto back camera, 8MP wide selfie camera, 2MP iris scanner camera, Exynos 9810 (10 nm) chipset, 4000mAh battery capacity, 6/8GB RAM, 128/512GB storage options, 15W wired charger and 5W wireless charger. == Software == The Galaxy Note 9 run Android 8.1 Oreo for the first time, it can upgrade to other versions like Android 9 Pie and Android 10 when they came out. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2018 Category:Samsung Galaxy Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras
title: Samsung Galaxy Note 9
